title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Electric bicycles mid drive  Cruisers Complete ebikes or Convert your Bicycle to an electric bike
text:
Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your performance.
Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.
E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :
1. Type of terrain.
2. Torque.
3. Speed.
4. Range.
5. Frame size.
6. Weight.
7. Riding preferences .
Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:

Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)
Your height ( right frame size )
Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)

WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:
1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :

You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.
Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?
Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.

2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATION

Your bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .
In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .

3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITY

Choices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.
Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.
A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.

4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICE

S.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.
We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.
100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee



Chilled Squirrel 

www.chilledsquirrel.com
Company Reg. No: 2014/016572/07  | VAT Reg. No.: 4240268286

title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

significantly.

setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

10 Speed long range drive train provides a

title: 2010 GT Sensor 27.5" Small
text:
Size S 
Upgraded to 2 x 9 Group, 27.5" wheels.

Fox F series Fork, Float shock, 100mm front and rear.
XT derailleur and shifters.
LX hollow crank.
Avid Elixer brakes.
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: 20″ Freestyle BMX Stunt Bike – Grey
text: https://www.shopplaypens.co.za/product/20-freestyle-bmx-stunt-bike-grey/This beast is a serious toy for riders like your youngster who dares to be different and is looking for thrills and spills on these wheels, break the rules and be number 1!If you’re starting out in BMX-ing, the Go Easy range offers you performance and quality at an affordable price.The Go Easy BMX is all about having a great time with your mates (or kids!) and bmx-ing is recognised as a global extreme and fun sport that’s set to last!This Go Easy BMX features reduced fork clearance for easier foot jams, tapered stays, angled seat clamp and micro drop outs for a super clean looking back end. At its heart lies a rugged oversize high tensile tig welded freestyle frame and fork with sturdy spoke wheels which comes kitted out with powerful front and rear alloy V-type brakes, a padded freestyle saddle, gyro detangler, 2 finger alloy brake levers and 4 steel stunt pegs … which makes it cool and full of venom to say the least.Let’s get specific:– Freestyler handlebars with 360 degree rotor system– Strong freestyle hubs– One piece crank with compact disc– Hi-tensile steel frame and fork– Powerful v-brakes with gyro rotator for precise stopping and tangle free cables– Lightweight alloy rims– 4 Heavy duty stunt pegs– Adjustable handlebars and seat / high BMX handlebars for comfortable riding position– Chainguard for ultimate safety and durability– These bikes are 80% assembled/final assembly is requiredStart something great and watch your youngster thrive in this sport!

title: eBike 20” STEP-THROUGH FATTIE
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

 

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
A 21Ah 48V Samsung cell which doesn’t build up
memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and increases range
significantly. 

·        
A 25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides
motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter
setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

·        
10 Speed long range drive train provides a
suitable gear selection for any possible terrain. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface including the beach.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge 

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South African designed, tested, and
manufactured EBIKE  

                              

Mobile: 072 869
0153     Email: info@wowbikes.co.za

title: eBike COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

 

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

info@wowbikes.co.za

title: Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet (59-61cm) *NEAT*
text:
Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

sizes: M (55-59), L (59-61)

weight: 280 g (size M)

DELIVERY/MEET-UP CAN BE ARRANGED.

title: Thule ClipOn3 *LIKE NEW*
text:
Retails for R3000+ at major retailer, you can get it in almost new condition for only R2000.

Thule's Clip On 9104 Bike Rack ia an easy-to-use, hanging-style trunk bike rack designed for station wagons and hatchbacks and will store 3 bikes with relative ease. It is easily mountable due to Thule's unique snap-on system and the rubber coated components ensure that your bike and car paint will not be damaged by this bike rack in any way.

Key Features:
- All parts in contact with the car and bikes are coated with rubber for extra protection.
- Easy to mount to the rear door with a unique snap-on system.
- Quickly folds for easy storage.
- Possible to attach Thule Light board 976.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies’ bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes)
- This product does not have universal fit and it comes in two versions (9103 and 9104) having different tube diameters fitting different car models
- Max load capacity is 45kg with each bike weighing in at a maximum of 15kg each
- Dimensions(cm): 57 x 82 x 116 (Folded: 57 x 18 x 117)
- Weight: 7.1kg

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

text:
Model: Thule 532 FreeRIDE, (Made in Poland) 

Features and Specifications:

* In overall Excellent Condition 
* Functional and easy-to-use upright bike carrier
* Easy and firm bike fixation
* Stable frame holder
* Firm Wheel Fixation 
* Quick Release Wheel Straps
* Locks the bike to the bike rack and the bike rack to the roof racks
* Locks included
* Exclusive Titanium colour
* Fits Bike Frames of up to 80 mm in diameter, (oval 65x80 mm and round 22-70 mm.)
* Can be folded on the roof when not in use. 
* Compatible with the Single Key System. 
* Maximum weight per Bike: 17 kg.
* Weight of THULE Bike Carrier: 3,5 kgs 
* No Tools are required. 
* T-track Adapters included for mounting the bike rack directly on the T-tracks of the roof racks. 
* Wheel clamps fitted to facilitate loading and straps that release easily and adjust to different wheel sizes.

title: EBIKE 20” STEP-THROUGH FATTIE
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

 

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
A 21Ah 48V Samsung cell which doesn’t build up
memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and increases range
significantly. 

·        
A 25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides
motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter
setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

·        
10 Speed long range drive train provides a
suitable gear selection for any possible terrain. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface including the beach.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge 

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South African designed, tested, and
manufactured EBIKE

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

 

Trike is fitted with.

a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front

title: Giant Talon MTB 27.5 Medium
text: Men's Giant Talon 27.5 in size Medium ready to be snapped up.Bike has only been used to commute to work and back (16km each way) pretty much every day. Yes a couple of scratches here and there but nothing from a fall or accident. the shock has been locked out all this time some pretty much brand new / no usage at all.3 x 8 Speed Shimano gear set and crank with Tektro Xiuriga disc brakes. Has an an extra length seat post and will come with the standard flat pedals and original Giant saddle (unused) that the bike came with so yes NOT that which you see in the photos. Will also come with an extra brand new tyre and some tubes.Bike has just been serviced at Hatton Cycles where new cables, (inners and outer) and brake pads were fitted.The price is negotiable within reason of course and payment is by cash only. Viewing after 6pm Mon, Wed, Thurs and Fri. If your interested, please send me a WhatsApp.

title: 2019 Specialized Stumpjumper
text:
Hi all. 

Selling this Beautiful 2019 Specialized Stumpjumper in almost perfect condition. The frame has been wrapped since day one with only one or 2 marks. Brand new 2021 Fox 36 fork. Dropper post was serviced in November at Specialized Stellenbosch. Brakes has been bled and the rear brake had a full service. Both tyres have new valves and topped up with new sealent. I will also incl a extra 12 speed chain. Also incl is the end caps for the wheels if you want to switch over to a Rock Shox fork. 

Overall everything is in amazing condition and photos cant do it justice. 
Based in Centurion. 
Shipping is available. 
Price is neg. 

Phillippe

title: Multifuntional Adult Tricycle(with basket) #As New!
text:
This lovely red Adult Tricycle, as in the second image, is in NEW condition - only used once or twice up and down the street. 
Perfect condition! 
Great gift for young and old - from young people who want to save on fuel cost to pop in at the shops, to taking the little ones for a fun ride, to elderly cyclists wanting to continue in physical activities or an active elderly person who likes to go to the shops, beach or walking the dogs. Can also make the perfect gift to disabled children or adults. 
Only reason for sale is that it was a birthday gift of a family member who rode it twice down the street - she sadly passed away before she could really use it. Top of the range tricycle - Selling New at Olympic Cycles @ R11000. 
Asking price is R9000, but willing to accomodate offers up to R8000. 

If interested kindly contact via WhatsApp on 0792473733 to arrange for viewing and collection. 
Thank you.
